background.positive:
Show the main subject on the perfectly flat background.
Make sure the subject is fully visible.
Turn background solid warm gray color.
Keep exactly the same design, pose, proportions, materials, texture, surface details, patterns, and COLORS as in the original image.
Preserve all original textures, surface finishes, material properties, and visual style.
Maintain original color palette, brightness, contrast, saturation, hue, white balance, and lighting direction on the subject.
Do not alter any visual characteristics, artistic style, or design elements of the subject.
Preserve fine details, edges, and sharpness.
